references.paper_title: Deep learning for day forecasts from sparse observations
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the deep learning approach to weather forecasting used in the current study.

references.paper_title: Accurate medium-range global weather forecasting with 3d neural networks
references.reason: This study provides a state-of-the-art benchmark for medium-range global weather forecasting using 3D neural networks.

references.paper_title: Physics-informed neural networks (pinns) for fluid mechanics: A review
references.reason: This paper reviews the state-of-the-art in physics-informed neural networks and is highly relevant to the physics-AI hybrid modeling approach in the current study.

references.paper_title: Adaptive Fourier neural operators: Efficient token mixers for transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces Adaptive Fourier Neural Operators, a crucial component of the physics-AI hybrid model developed in this study.

references.paper_title: Learning skillful medium-range global weather forecasting
references.reason: This paper describes a state-of-the-art model for medium-range global weather forecasting which is used as a comparison model in this work.
